title: Arriva
description: Arriva is recognized for its vibrant and diverse color palette that represents its brand identity. The brand incorporates a combination of deep blues and turquoise shades (004D73, 00334E, 007FDB) alongside lighter tones like DBEBFA, creating a sense of trust and reliability. Accents of purple (832561) and green (11862F) add a distinct flair, while yellows (BFCA02) and grays (848A8C) offer balance and versatility. These colors are prominently featured as part of their visual design on their website, http://www.arrivabus.co.uk/, and can be cross-verified through branding resource platforms such as https://brandingguide.app/brand/arriva/assets.
